title: Deep Rock Oil Fonts
content:
Can anyone tell me what font this would be or something close to it. I know that is has been distorted . . so I am just looking at the characters.

thanks in advance for any help.

j-

 [‹ Help with this font](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234756/http:/typophile.com/node/40020 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID needed ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234756/http:/typophile.com/node/40018 "Go to next forum topic")
author: gsequel1

comments.content:
Here is a link to another if that photo didn’t show up.

[http://www.iowagas.com/images/2006/IMAGES/DeepRock.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234756/http:/www.iowagas.com/images/2006/IMAGES/DeepRock.jpg "http://www.iowagas.com/images/2006/IMAGES/DeepRock.jpg")

It looks to be derived from or inspired by [Serpentine](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234756/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/serpentine/familytree.html) caps, though, yes, very condensed and distorted.

This was probably hand-painted back in the day.

- Lex
